projectGridLines.title: Title:Software Intern (Supply Chain and Retail Technology)
projectGridLines.description:
Title:Software Intern (Supply Chain and Retail Technology)

Description: Supply chain and retail Technology group is the key platform to enable

all inbound inventory and outbound shipments for customer orders. This encompasses

the logistics, transportation, fulfillment which includes complex work on both planning,

execution and optimization in order to inbound, store and deliver the orders with the

best customer experience.

Skill sets:Computer Science, Programming in any popular language (Java/C#

preferred), Git, Linux/Unix based operating system, SQL, NoSQL, Message

Queues, Cloud native applications.

Expected learning: Interns will have hands-on experience by working on real

world problems to build production systems at PB scale using Google Cloud

Platform services and other software tools (for CI/CD and Infra) that cater to

millions of Wayfairs customers. They will learn on how the Supply chain space

works within an e-commerce industry at depth and all about software

development lifecycle using agile methodology.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science

Fundamentals, Big Data, Object Oriented Design, Databases.
